sentences.english: That meant political troublemakers who did not have a lot of support.
sentences.chinese: 其意思是少有支持者的政坛捣乱分子。

sentences.english: For the European commission chief is one of the luckiest guys in international politics.
sentences.chinese: 因为欧盟委员会主席实在是国际政坛幸运者之一。

sentences.english: The Daleys and Chicago politics seem to be made for one another.
sentences.chinese: 戴利家族和芝加哥政坛似乎是休戚与共。

sentences.english: The HKPA's influence in Hong Kong politics has waned over the years.
sentences.chinese: 近年，港进联在香港政坛的影响力越来越小。

sentences.english: The second most common"profession"is that of businessman.
sentences.chinese: 位居政坛中最普遍“职业”次席的是商人。

sentences.english: In fact, he found it impossible to participate in American public life.
sentences.chinese: 但他发现他不能厕身美国政坛。

sentences.english: Now the political world has begun to focus on the immensity of her achievement.
sentences.chinese: 现在世界政坛开始聚焦她的丰功伟绩。

sentences.english: However, this could prolong the uncertainty that has sapped market confidence.
sentences.chinese: 但这会延长已经打压了市场信心的政坛不稳定期。

sentences.english: So Your Party has emerged as a new force in Japanese politics.
sentences.chinese: 因此，大家党得以成为日本政坛的一支新兴势力。

sentences.english: The most notable monkey in world politics is Ban.
sentences.chinese: 潘基文是世界政坛最著名的肖猴者。

sentences.english: Some of these women have made it on their own.
sentences.chinese: 这些女性中有部分是依靠自己的实力走上政坛。

sentences.english: The names mentioned on the cables are political veterans, not just any Tom, Dick, or Harry.
sentences.chinese: 电报引述的人物都是政坛翘楚，皆非等闲之辈。

sentences.english: It is said that relations victory Lizhen her tireless hard work on the politics of the harvest.
sentences.chinese: 有人说，关丽珍的胜利是她在政坛上不懈耕耘的收获。

sentences.english: Zhao Binglin was an imperial remonstrator who was influential in political arena during the late Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 赵炳麟是晚清政坛上具有重要影响的言官。

sentences.english: He navigates celebrity dinner galas like a seasoned politician.
sentences.chinese: 他游刃有余地参加名流晚宴，宛如政坛老将。

sentences.english: The dramatic change on the Egyptian political arena on Friday signals foreign intervention, said Yin.
sentences.chinese: 上周五埃及政坛戏剧性变化信号外来干涉，表示阴。

definition: to overthrow/downfall/to fall from power/to go bankrupt
within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)
to wield (political etc) power/be in power
